imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters

Class NagaoMatsuyamaFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.filters.GenericFilter
      • imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters.NagaoMatsuyamaFilter

  • public class NagaoMatsuyamaFilter
extends GenericFilter
    This class implements a 5x5 Nagao-Matsuyama filter, as described in NagaoMatsuyama (1979).
    Version:
    2013/05/30

        Description copied from class: GenericFilter
        Calculates and returns the filter result for a single pixel at the given position.
        Specified by:
        filterPixel in class GenericFilter
        Parameters:
        image - the ImageAccessor.Scalar representing the source (scalar-valued) image
        u - the horizontal pixel position
        v - the vertical pixel position
        Returns:
        the resulting (scalar) filter value for the specified pixel position
